I bought New Balance minimalist running shoes and they fall about year and a half in.  Get these shoes and you will be glad you did.

I keep them at the office and wear them all day there. I find myself randomly spreading my toes often throughout the day.  One thing I discovered: my sneakers have gotten a lot more comfortable after wearing these.

Extremely comfortable shoes, well made, and stylish.  Definitely recommend, I might get a second pair in a different color.

评论详情: These are my second pair. I love them....except for the sole. The upper portion holds up nicely, as does the glue at the sole, but the tread wears out WAY to fast. I only walk in mine and the tread life is much less than it should be, and I feel the manufacturer could spend a very small amount of money to make this a great shoe, instead of an average good one.

Seems to be well built. Plenty of traction, however. Advertised as wide toe box. Not the case. I have a wide foot, usually shop for wide shoes and purchased these thinking they were considering the add says “wide toe box”, but they are more like a standard shoe. But that is my only issue. So understand when buying, if you have caveman feet like mine, these are not the best option. But probably fantastic for a normal human.
These are better shoes for $40ish dollars than what I've paid for $90+. Would buy again.

Excellent sizing, good arch support. This is my first time trying this style of shoe. I didn't get them for running, I just got them for day to day wear. I am pleasantly surprised at how comfortable they really are.

评论概述: First pair of these style of shoe. Love it!
评论详情: So far, so good. I love this new style of shoes. The brand seems to be well made. I'll update the durability.
Light weight, very comfortable, and surprisingly tough. Highly recommend them.
I usually wear a Size 12 Wide. These shoes were way too narrow for me to wear comfortably.

First time trying barefoot/minimalist shoes and I love them.  First off, for those mentioning lack of insole padding you're missing the point.  You're supposed to feel every stick and rock while walking, if you can't handle that these shoes aren't for you.I carry about 25 extra pounds on my 6'1" frame and as I've aged my knees and feet feel it.  After wearing these shoes for a while I have much less pain in my knees.  Honestly I thought the hype was a bunch of BS but took a chance to find out for myself.  I walk our dogs daily on wooded dirt trails, the terrain is fairly rugged and it took some getting used to in these Whitin shoes.  I now feel no pain climbing stairs, where in the past it was a bit difficult.These shoes may not be a life changer for everyone but for me I'm a believer.  Now that winter is approaching here I'm shopping for a warmer pair.  I've put a lot of walking miles (not jogging, can't speak to that) on these and they are holding up exceptionally well.  The "not very expensive" gamble paid off for me.

评论概述: Nice for walking but not for running

I bought these to workout in. I have a garage gym. They are perfect for added traction and comfort. I used to workout barefooted but these provide more comfort on the concrete floor and horse stall mats.

Bought this as a gift for a friend who has wide feet and needed zero drop shoes for sword training. The shoe is comfortable for a wide and muscled foot, and the lacing allows for a snug fit. The sole grip is excellent.

These are just wide toebox shoes. They have way too much cushion for barefoot shoes. Maybe better for running or if that’s what you’re looking for but I’m looking for a true barefoot shoe to help strengthen my feet.

I bought this style for my home workouts so I could jump right into the shoe without socks.  This has been handy for me and ordered this plus the gum bottom.  I've not actually worn the black bottom yet but they are the exact same and so far has been a good fit and works well cross-training.

These are my new favorite. I wanted to try barefoot shoes because sometimes all the extras of other shoes contain my feet too much and the they start to hurt between the bones. These sneakers allow my toes and bones to stretch out more. I am not sure how they will be for long walks on pavement. Need to take a train ride to NYC to test them out.
These are the only shoes that ever fit my foot.

评论概述: Great value but stretch and tie won't stay tight
评论详情: Used for cross training (lifting, sprinting, box jumps, random) at gym. Great for lifting because they are minimalist and flat. Perfect for squat, deadlift, etc. where you need a flat shoe surface and don't want a cushiony shoe. I also use for light running (less than mile) and sprinting and work great.  Not a lot of arch support or cushion but it's not what i was after.  I have averaged 3 times a week for one hour of cross training. These shoes worked great for 4 to 6 months.  Even with wide feet, the toe box couldn't get or stay tight as the ties are further up the shoe, and i had them eventually all the way tight. They lasted about 6 or so months before the shoes were too loose to wear for general gym use. They would fall off during prowler (sled) pushes, etc.  The tread is extremely durable and after 10 months in nearly new condition.  Overall good value if you don't mind the stretch and having to get new shoes in 6 to 12 months.

Wow!I should of got these a long time ago.These are so beautiful.The fit is nice.I know i do have to break them in.Also I will be buying some more of these type of footwear. I just can't believe  how comfortable they feel.Way to go.Amazon!!!!You picked a winner.

I've had these shoes for almost a year and hardly ever used them until recently.  I never used the heel pull that is at is behind the heel to help pull my foot into them until now and it broke off.  Why do companies even put these things on shoes if they aren't strong enough?!  It's the same way with those holds on the sides of mattresses, because the first time you use them they break too!I honestly do like these shoes but can't give it more than a 1 star rating because of the heel pull and they are out of warranty, so they can't be replaced.
Fit great I walk 8-12 miles a day for work.. was pessimistic about the support but stand corrected.. gonna buy another pair around the holidays..

Fit's precisely to size. It contours well to the feet and has a very comfortable feel. Looks great.

评论概述: Amazing for Barefoot Walking, but Durability Could Be Improved
评论详情: I've been wearing the WHITIN Men's Cross-Trainer Barefoot & Minimalist Shoes for the past 170 days, and they have quickly become my go-to footwear. As someone who's passionate about minimalist shoes, I love the natural feel they offer. They might look a bit unconventional at first, but they have genuinely helped heal my feet.  I track all of my walks and hikes, and in the time I've had these shoes, I've covered approximately 880 miles (about 1,820,700 steps). That said, while the shoes have been fantastic for foot health, they haven't held up as well as I’d hoped. After logging so many miles, there are now large holes in the toes, which is disappointing given their performance otherwise.  If you're looking for a shoe that gives you a true barefoot experience and helps with foot recovery, these are a great option. Just be aware that their durability might not match up if you put them through heavy use like I did.
these can take a beating, good shoes.
You can run in them, walk long distances, and be very comfortable in them. Great choice! I’m about to buy the black ones. I use them for work.

评论概述: Great for the flip flop wearer!
评论详情: I am a flip flop wearer anytime I can. Never really enjoy tennis shoes/running shoes. These are absolutely amazing! Wore them for the first time at an all day amusement park, no pain or discomfort at all. They are great when they get wear, but are a bit warm for a hot day.
These fit perfectly and they have lasted me a very long time. I just ordered another pair
These shoes are perfect for walking along the beach, or gravel roads and our breathable. Regular gymshoes / sneakers would cause my small toe to feel numb or go to sleep, but not with these.
this is second pair, ran more than 800 km of trails with first one and still in good condition, i bet will last at least for 1000 km. Very comfortable, looks good, great longevity.
I got tired of tying my shoelaces at the gym,  so I got these.  They stay tight in my feet,  and for as close as socks.

Love these.  Have had foot issues for quite a while.  I have had very expensive shoes in the past.  These are by far the best and my foot issues are minimal when wearing these.  I have ordered 3 pairs.

Very bad
I bought these for working out at the gym and they fit like a glove. They are lightweight and feel like a sock. I love them.
Look good.Feel good,Like walking on a massage machine.I been around and these are the best in 75 years of wearing shoes.....Dude... get em now!.

My first barefoot shoe was Weweyas.  Love them. I decided to try Whitman after a pair of my Weweyas died after three years of use and abuse.While these Whitman are zero-drop shoes, I wouldn't consider them "barefoot."  The toe box isn't wide enough.  It's almost like wearing my Skeechers.  While not snug on my feet, my toes lack wiggle room.  I am returning them and just getting the same pair of Weweyas.My new Weweyas and old pair are on the left and right,  respectively. The Whitman is in the middle.  The picture doesn't really show the different in width but once on, you can feel it.The shoe otherwise looks well made.  Really sad about returning them.Update:  I removed the insole and the shoe felt roomier.  The Whitin is 1/4 inch narrower than my Weweyas.  Removing the insole really helped.  Keeping the shoe.  Giving it 4 stars because it should be a tad wider.
The most comfortable I have ever worn. Feels like I am barefoot all day
fits perfect and feels so good... I want a few more pairs..

评论用户: Great product, made well fits my Ruger Max 9 perfectly.
评论概述: WHITIN Men's Cross-Trainer | Barefoot & Minimalist Shoe
评论详情: Extremely comfortable, great traction on sole, lightweight, easy to put on and take off.
The tread have held up pretty well so far. They are comfortable despite having no cushion and they look really good too. Definitely worth the price

评论概述: Feel the breeze! Phenomenal shoes! Great value Couldn’t resist a second pair to keep clean.
评论详情: You can truly feel the breeze through these shoes with average to thin socks. I love it. My feet are always hot and sweaty. Which Segways into my only minor issue with the shoes. And to their credit, I believe my sweaty feet wear out MOST insoles more rapidly than other folks feet. lol!  Also I think the insoles are designed to let you feel the ground after they’re “broken-in”, which is what I want. And they are available for replacement for like $2.99, so I’m not complaining. Just informing.  The rest of this long review is all positive. The insoles are my only small con, see the last photo. They halfway wore out in 3 months of extremely heavy use. So maybe it’s almost a feature and not a flaw. You want to feel the ground? Keep your insoles. Don’t mind feeling it or not? Buy replacements. I’ll keep mine till they fall apart.  These shoes have acted as my one and only pair of shoes. I mean no other shoes used at all except slides occasionally for convenience. Any time I actually want to move around or walk/run efficiently, these shoes and only these are worn. I can stop on a dime/turn on a dime oh so comfortably. I’ve been working and exercising both indoors/outdoors alike, and enjoying leisure, day in and day out in these shoes.  This is my second pair! I wish the grey was darker but who cares. They are THAT good. The other ones are still great. I’ve just dedicated them to the work at the construction site and the outdoors. Because they are SO MUCH MORE COMFORTABLE than work boots(obviously).  I love sneaking around(OSHA) in them on the job site. Another worker was walking by and my feet were at his eye-level. In passing, he poked my big toe and laughed! Lmbo. You’re technically supposed to wear puncture resistant, steel toed boots. But I’ve been doing end stage HVAC construction so it’s easy to stay safe. Just watch out for occasional nails and metal shards. I bet I’m more comfortable in my actual physical shoes than anyone else there!  I wouldn't even call this a gripe, because I’m keeping them. But the “dark grey” color is not dark. I’m tempted to return them and get black with gum sole, but I don’t like gum soles so I think I’ll keep them. They look great. Love the black strings and blue accent design on the sides. Such a great pair of shoes for the price. Even if they did cost more from what I can tell, they’d be worth it. Perhaps I’ll review again or update how long they last.  [Amazon prompted to review the “slipperiness”] They aren’t slippery at all to me! A 26 year old, average weight male. I went from Addidas with a sole smooth as butter! I would slip as soon as there was enough rain to coat the bottom of my shoes. So immediately after it started raining. These have phenomenal grip. I use them for every day use rain or shine. They have also performed wonderfully on my trail hikes here and there as well! I love feeling the rocks, and tree roots beneath my feet. You’ll even feel the subtle crunch of leaves and pine straw beneath your feet.  They fit great too. No surprise. I have worn US size 11 in men’s for all my tennis shoes since I was a teen. I didn’t check a conversion chart or anything. Just ordered 11s and they fit exactly as I would hope. Couldn’t be happier.

Fit is perfect and very comfortable. Arch and ball support. Love the convenient lacing feature. Never have to tie laces or have then come unlaced. Just pull the tab to tighten, and squeeze the tab to release. So easy.

评论概述: I sized 1 up and theyre still snug and comfy
评论详情: I have yet to wear them more, but they feel comfy, will update once i wear them for longer periods, running and other activities

My 13 year old son wore these for XCountry. After only 2 days of practice, the laces are broken and snapping in multiple spots. The lace that attaches to the Velcro piece of the shoelace is undone. I can’t replace the shoelaces because of the Velcro attachment. The cloth above it is already showing wear. TWO PRACTICES!!

probably should've gotten a 12 instead of an 11. though with the sole out fits fine. feel good to walk in bunion toe pain kept to minimum until i hit distance then doesn't really matter what shoe I'm wearing. probably need to start wrapping. these are great just enough firmness and flexibility that I can do push ups with ease and not have my toe pain be the limiting factor so now i can actually challenge myself with push ups.

This brand runs a bit small. I did measure my feet and size 8 was the correct size. But with socks on, its a tad bit too small. But ive been wearing it for several weeks. I mainly use it for the gym. This was my first barefoot type shoes. Overall, I like it. I ended up buying the vivo barefoot. Shoes. Quality much better but a lot more expensive. But the fit is much better. I bought a size 8 and it fits perfectly with socks on.

I walk 12 miles a day, I just got these shoes yesterday and have already put about 10 miles on them, walked a few trails last night and wow!!! The grip and comfort these shoes have. Definitely worth the money!! We will see how long they last with walking that much but, honestly for the look and the comforbility it's worth it.
The correct size of shoe was ordered and received.  The shoe feels almost 2 sizes smaller than the 8.5 size ordered.  Was not able to get them on my feet.
Shoes are well made and comfortable, but I should have ordered the larger size than recommended. Size chart is off.
I do not recommend this product. No cushion in the insoles of this shoe.  My feet started hurting wearing these during my workout at the gym.

Decent looking, good fit, great price!

Seriously, sending previously worn shoes with footprints and hair on the insoles ???  Ordered a size smaller which is too tight from the last pair which I have, so went up a size and knew something was off based on the packaging.  Absolutely disgusting. Instant exchange.
Never do I write reviews but 5 minutes after wearing these and I had to. Was quite skeptical due to the price but couldn’t be more pleasantly surprised. Ordering two more pair today.
Helps slow the pain of falling arches. Made the last outing with the grands really enjoyable.
The shoes came well packed, looks with good quality. Wide enough in the toes. They are true to size with socks. Feet are getting sweaty fast without socks. Very easy to wear
Love these shoes. I sometimes forget i have these on.
I love these shoes. Very comfortable! They seem to be holding up well for running errands . I have narrow feet and they feel good but with wider toe box.

评论概述: Shoes are a great value for the price
评论详情: I bought these barefoot shoes to try and build up the strength in my feet. They fit well and are very comfortable. I have been wearing them hiking and I notice that my feet are a little sore after wearing them , almost like your muscles are sore after a work out. I think the soreness is a sign that my feet are getting stronger and won't cramp as much when I'm barefoot. It's still early yet, but I think these are great shoes for the price.

Have had foot pain for years and after 2 weeks it is gone !!! The 1st 3 days my feet hurt a little more than they usually hurt, walked 2 1/2 miles and wore them all day, The start of the 4th day the foot pain was gone and I have more feeling in my feet now and my balance is better. going to order another pair!! Also I am 69 years old and amazed in the change for the better.
Very comfortable to wear and makes walking easy. Though time will tell, shoes for now seem,  very durable.

These are the most flimsy cross training shoes that I've ever purchased. I wore them once and unfortunately, put them aside and missed the window for return, or I certainly would have returned them.  Right now, they'll be used as mud sneakers.

评论概述: Super comfortable fit, has been lasting well. Very lightweight!
评论详情: Super comfortable fit, has been lasting well. Very lightweight! Great for casual use, walking, wearing while shopping, etc. Not really a supportive shoe per se, but for what I use them for, they are great. If I were hiking, for example, I would wear a stronger, more supportive shoe.  They grip extremely well on just about any surface, even in the rain, on slippery rocks, etc. I will purchase these again when needed.

评论详情: They did not last for me. They have disintegrated and insole is full of holes and no longer provides any support. the sole also worn out. I would expected better quality for the price that these sell for.

Decent barefoot shoe. I used as a water shoe in Hawaii, hiking up rocky riverbeds and freshwater pools. Decent traction, though they are slippery when walking on mossy or muddy rock. They don’t dry as quickly as water shoes, but these are more than capable of being used as water shoes.

评论概述: Husband is happy with his new shoes.
评论详情: Shoes look nice and fit well.  I bought them for my husband who likes slip on shoes now that he is 70.  The easy-grip string closure is good for kids and older people!  It's a nice feature.  We like the look of the dark gray shoe.  It is comfortable to walk in.  I am well pleased with this purchase!  True to size, easy to get on foot.
Great for walking

I thought I would try these shoes to work in my shop.  They are very lightweight.  The tread is more like a crosstreck  shoe.  They have a great pul to tighten aspect.  Easy to put on even for a 70 year old.
Had for 2yrs and just need to replace insoles with flat ones with no heal

评论概述: Good for hiking in dry conditions.
评论详情: We went on a couple mile hike to devils kettle in MI and these held up good, had good grip and the fit was extremely comfortable for the day. They seem pretty well made but once they get wet they stay wet unfortunately. Walking in the river wasn’t a great idea but I wanted to see how they’d hold up. Grip went out the window as soon as they were wet and I tried to walk on rocks. You can feel all the stuff you step on but that’s also the point of getting barefoot shoes so don’t expect them to feel like work boots..

评论详情: Excelente para practicar yoga sobre cesped y evitar practicar descalzo , al mismo tiempo lo utilizo para trotar antes de la practica .

评论概述: A different feel on the feet.
评论详情: I didn't really like these at first but after wearing them for about a week, I have grown to really like them. They are comfortable. The soles aren't as thick as a sneaker, but they still provide ample shock absorption.

Quite durable overall. Has a wide comfortable toe box ( wider than Vivo). Provides good bottom surface area for stability. A lot of flexibility overall. Okay to get wet, make sure to dry fully otherwise gets little funky. Good price for good quality

评论概述: Imagine... a shoe actually shaped like a foot!
评论详情: Why do we cram our feet into shoes with narrowing tips? Your foot is not pointy! It doesn't make any sense. These are great dupes (my NB Minimus shoes come to mind) and the quality seems on par with recognizable brands. Only time will tell if they are as durable.

I have had these for over 1 year and have really put them to the test to see how durable they really are. I purchased them to play disc golf in the hot summer months of Texas where it gets over 100 on a regular basis with 80% humidity. If you don't play disc golf please let me explain something to you. Disc golf footwear gets worn out fast. You plant your feet and then pivot on concrete, dirt, rocks, and other terrain. In addition, you will get your feet wet either playing in the early morning on the wet grass, or getting caught in the rain, or going to retrieve a shot in the water hazard. These things have seen it all. I have even used them to mow the yard with a manual push lawn mower without any problems. Based on my discgolf app (Udisc) I have walked/hiked approximately 60 miles in them and they're still going strong.

Ordered two other brands before I got what was described.  Unbelievably comfortable and lightweight... Will field test by walking to the mall to return the other two that were miserable failures to what they were described to be.  I wear a size 12, but had to order 12 1/2 to get proper fit.  Very satisfied with these!!!

评论概述: Priced at half its closest competitor
评论详情: I have been trying to distance myself from the Merrell brand due to fitment issues. However it was hard to commit to another brand seeing that the entry price point is usually well over the 100 dollar mark. These shoes feel very familiar to my feet. I didn't have a long break in period or any issues with fitment. These run true to the size guild.  Now to the real test of the shoes Grip on dry creek rock - ✓ Grip on wet creek rock- ✓ Grip on wet creek rock- ✓ With moss. Grip on wet creek rock with- X thin layer of silt  Overall dry time from missing the last test Approx. 1 hr  Not bad for 40 bucks
good fit, fast delivery
